resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104770</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104770</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085828</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Professional development by email</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Professionelle Entwicklung durch email</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développement professionnel par l'email</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvimento profissional pelo email</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo professionale dal email</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επαγγελματική ανάπτυξη με ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desarrollo profesional por el email</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Conducting professional development by email can be an effective way to reach busy teachers, tailor the content to their needs, and provide an authentic context for learning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Professionelle Leitentwicklung durch email kann 
eine wirkungsvolle Methode sein, besetzte Lehrer zu erreichen, den 
Inhalt zu ihren Notwendigkeiten herzustellen, und einen authentischen 
Kontext für das Lernen zur Verfügung zu stellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le développement professionnel de conduite par 
l'email peut être une voie pertinente d'atteindre les professeurs 
occupés, de concevoir en fonction le contenu leurs besoins, et de 
fournir un contexte authentique pour l'étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenvolvimento profissional conduzindo pelo 
email pode ser uma maneira eficaz alcançar professores ocupados, 
costurar o índice a suas necessidades, e fornecer um contexto 
authentic para aprender.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo sviluppo professionale di condotta dal email 
può essere un modo efficace raggiungere gli insegnanti occupati, 
adeguare al soddisfare i loro bisogni e fornire un contesto autentico 
per imparare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διεύθυνση της επαγγελματικής ανάπτυξης με 
ηλεκτρονικό ταχυδρομείο μπορεί να είναι ένας αποτελεσματικός 
τρόπος να επιτευχθούν οι απασχολημένοι δάσκαλοι, να προσαρμοστεί 
το περιεχόμενο στις ανάγκες τους, και να παρασχεθεί ένα αυθεντικό
πλαίσιο για την εκμάθηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desarrollo profesional que conduce por el email 
puede ser una manera eficaz de alcanzar a profesores ocupados, de 
adaptar el contenido a sus necesidades, y de proporcionar a un 
contexto auténtico para aprender.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BOBBY HOBGOOD
FN:BOBBY HOBGOOD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085828</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104770</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/professional-development-by-email</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
